name: A burnt necklace with a charred black stone hanging from it
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
